name: Article analytics
author: Dinu Guzun

sections.description: Article analytics provides digital analytics of the visitors who read your posts. The following parameters can be configured: 1) Analysis period; 2) Type of audience (all visits, authenticated visits, anonymous visits); 3) Include owner visits for statistics;
sections.installation:
1. Upload article-analytics to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Set plugin parameters through the Article analytics menu in WordPress

short_description: Article analytics provides digital analytics of the visitors who read your posts.
description: Article analytics provides digital analytics of the visitors who read your posts. The following parameters can be configured: 1) Analysis period; 2) Type of audience (all visits, authenticated visits, anonymous visits); 3) Include owner visits for statistics;
